TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class ListItem : System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, System.Web.UI.IParserAccessor, System.Web.UI.IStateManager
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ListItem extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, class System.Web.UI.IParserAccessor, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class ListItem Implements IAttributeAccessor, IParserAccessor, IStateManager
public ref class ListItem sealed : System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor, System::Web::UI::IParserAccessor, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 代表資料繫結清單控制項中的資料項目。

span.span: Represents a data item in a data-bound list control.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項都代表個別的資料內的項目資料繫結清單控制項，例如或控制項。A control represents an individual data item within a data-bound list control, such as a or a control. 有幾種方式來指定項目在清單控制項中顯示的文字。There are several ways to specify the text displayed for an item in the list control. 最常見的方法是將文字放在內部的 HTML 內容。The most common method is by placing text in the inner HTML content. 在內部將 HTML 內容是文字的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。The inner HTML content is the text between the opening and closing tags of the control. 您也可以使用屬性來指定項目的清單控制項中顯示的文字。You can also use the property to specify the text displayed in the list control for the item. 屬性可讓您關聯值的項目在清單控制項中，此外在控制項中顯示的文字。The property allows you to associate a value with the item in the list control, in addition to the text displayed in the control. 例如，您可以顯示文字的項目在清單控制項中，例如`"Item 1"`，並使用屬性指定值，該項目，例如`"$1.99"`。For example, you can display text for an item in the list control, such as `"Item 1"`, and use the property to specify a value for that item, such as `"$1.99"`. 您可以有內部的 HTML 內容的任何組合，或屬性集。You can have any combination of the inner HTML content, , or properties set. 產生的 HTML 輸出控制項取決於這三個屬性所設定的組合。The resulting HTML output for the control depends on the combination of these three properties that are set. 例如，如果所有的三個屬性都設為如下：For example, if all three properties are set as follows: ``` Inner 1 ``` 內容的內部 html 內容呈現內部 HTML 和屬性用於`Value`屬性。The inner HTML content is used for rendered inner HTML content and the property is used for the `Value` attribute. 產生的 HTML 轉譯輸出為：The resulting HTML rendering output is: ``` ``` 下表列出設定屬性與對應的屬性，用來呈現的內部 HTML 內容的組合和`Value`屬性。The following table lists the combination of set properties and the corresponding property used for the rendered inner HTML content and `Value` attribute. 在左側的三個資料行清單設定屬性的組合。The three columns on the left list the combination of set properties. 在右側的兩個資料行列出對應的屬性使用哪些屬性值。The two columns on the right list which property value is used for the corresponding attribute. |內部的 HTML 內容Inner HTML content|Text 屬性Text property|Value 屬性Value property|呈現的內部 HTML 內容Rendered Inner HTML content|轉譯的 Value 屬性Rendered Value attribute| |------------------------|-------------------|--------------------|---------------------------------|------------------------------| |設定Set|設定Set|設定Set|內部的 HTML 內容Inner HTML content|Value 屬性Value property| |設定Set|設定Set|未設定Not set|內部的 HTML 內容Inner HTML content|內部的 HTML 內容Inner HTML content| |設定Set|未設定Not set|設定Set|內部的 HTML 內容Inner HTML content|Value 屬性Value property| |設定Set|未設定Not set|未設定Not set|內部的 HTML 內容Inner HTML content|內部的 HTML 文字Inner HTML text| |未設定Not set|設定Set|設定Set|Text 屬性Text property|Value 屬性Value property| |未設定Not set|設定Set|未設定Not set|Text 屬性Text property|Text 屬性Text property| |未設定Not set|未設定Not set|設定Set|Value 屬性Value property|Value 屬性Value property| |未設定Not set|未設定Not set|未設定Not set|未設定Not set|未設定Not set| > [!NOTE] > 因為和屬性每個都有預設值為空字串，就可以將空的清單項目在清單控制項中。Because the and properties each have a default value of an empty string, it is possible to have empty list items in the list control. 顯示在清單控制項時，任何用來控制其屬性設定為`true`會反白顯示在控制項中。When a list control is displayed, any control with its property set to `true` appears highlighted in the control. 控制項提供屬性可讓您指定是否啟用或停用控制項。The control provides the property to allow you to specify whether a control is enabled or disabled. A已停用的控制項灰色，表示它不能選取。A control that is disabled is dimmed to indicate that it cannot be selected. 使用這個屬性停用控制項在控制項或控制項。Use this property to disable a control in either a control or a control. > [!NOTE] > 您無法使用這個屬性停用控制控制項或控制項。You cannot use this property to disable a control in a control or control. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下列範例說明使用內控制控制項。The following example illustrates the use of controls within a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ListItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListItem Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ListItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ListItem Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/CS/listitemcollectioncs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListBoxMultiSelectExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListBoxMultiSelectExample/VB/listitemcollectionvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`Text`|`text` 參數的值。The value of the `text` parameter.| |`Value`|`value` 參數的值。The value of the `value` parameter.| |`Enabled`|`enabled` 參數的值。The value of the `enabled` parameter.| ## Examples 下列範例會示範將項目和移除項目從控制項。The following example demonstrates adding items to and removing items from controls. 當選取的項目`ListBox1`控制項，新可以建立並加入至具有相同值的控制項`ListBox2`控制，如果`ListBox2`控制項並未包含該文字的項目。When an item is selected in the `ListBox1` control, a new control with the same value can be created and added to the `ListBox2` control, if the `ListBox2` control does not already contain an item with that text. 在此範例中呼叫建構函式`enabled`設`true`。In this example the constructor is called with `enabled` set to `true`. 如果使用呼叫`enabled`設`false`，新控制項不會出現在控制項。If it was called with `enabled` set to `false`, the new control would not appear in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用管理屬性名稱 / 值組的集合宣告中開頭和結尾標記，但不是直接支援的類別。Use the collection to manage the attribute name and value pairs declared in the opening and closing tags of the , but not directly supported by the class. 以程式設計的方式，您可以新增或移除集合的屬性。You can programmatically add or remove attributes to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否啟用清單項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the list item is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用清單項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the list item is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定是否啟用或停用控制項。The property allows you to specify whether a control is enabled or disabled. A已停用的控制項灰色，表示它不能選取。A control that is disabled is dimmed to indicate that it cannot be selected. 使用這個屬性停用控制項在控制項或控制項。Use this property to disable a control in either a control or a control. > [!NOTE] > 您無法使用這個屬性停用控制控制項或控制項。You cannot use this property to disable a control in a control or control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計的方式停用的清單項目控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically disable list items in a control. 第一個問題會要求使用者選取對應至使用者的職業的選項按鈕。The first question asks the user to select the radio button that corresponds to the user's occupation. 如果使用者表示他或她不為開發人員，會停用第二個圓鈕清單的清單項目。If the user indicates that he or she is not a developer, the list items in the second radio button list are disabled. 第二個問題會要求使用者選取主要的程式設計語言。The second question asks the user to select a primary programming language. 這個問題的答案不是開發人員的使用者無關。This question is not relevant to a user that is not a developer. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[ListItem.Enabled#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItem.Enabled/CS/listitem.enabledcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListItem.Enabled#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListItem.Enabled/VB/listitem.enabledvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 做為特定類型的雜湊函式，適用於雜湊演算法和資料結構，例如雜湊表。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否包含它的清單控制項中目前選取。Use the property to determine whether the is currently selected in the list control that contains it. 這個屬性通常用於，當逐一查看集合時清單控制項，以判斷是否已選取項目中的物件。This property is commonly used, when iterating through a collection of objects in a list control, to determine whether an item is selected. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性逐一集合控制項來決定哪些核取方塊已選取。The following example demonstrates how to use the property when iterating through the collection of a control to determine which check boxes are selected. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷所代表的項目在清單控制項中顯示的文字。Use the property to specify or determine the text displayed in a list control for the item represented by the . > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性包含`null`、`get`存取子會傳回的值屬性。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果屬性，依序包含`null`，傳回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
